bioconda.name: bioconductor-pepxmltab
bioconda.summary: Parsing pepXML files and filter based on peptide FDR.

biotools.summary: Parsing pepXML files based one XML package. The package tries to handle pepXML files generated from different softwares. The output will be a peptide-spectrum-matching tabular file. The package also provide function to filter the PSMs based on FDR.

bioschemas.name: pepXMLTab
bioschemas.summary: Parsing pepXML files based one XML package. The package tries to handle pepXML files generated from different softwares. The output will be a peptide-spectrum-matching tabular file. The package also provide function to filter the PSMs based on FDR.
